src:
カトリーヌ・ドヌーブさん入院、虚血性の血流障害

07 Nov 2019, 00:11



カトリーヌ・ドヌーブさん（ＡＦＰ時事）

　【パリ＝作田総輝】ＡＦＰ通信などは６日、フランスの女優カトリーヌ・ドヌーブさん（７６）が５日夜から翌日朝にかけて虚血性の血流障害を起こし、パリの病院に入院したと報じた。家族は、「軽度で運動機能の障害もなく、復帰は可能だが、しばらくは静養が必要だ」とコメントしているという。
　ドヌーブさんは「シェルブールの雨傘」や「終電車」など数々の映画作品に出演したフランスを代表する女優で、今年公開された是枝裕和監督の最新作「真実」でも主演を務めた。現在も別の作品の撮影に臨んでいたという。
text:
Hospitalized by Catherine Deneuve, ischemic blood flow disorder

07 Nov 2019, 00:11



Catherine Deneuve (AFP current affair)

[Paris = Soteru Sakuta] The AFP newsletter reported that French actress Catherine Deneuve (76) was admitted to a hospital in Paris due to ischemic blood flow problems from the night of the 5th to the morning of the following day. The family commented, “It is mild and there is no impairment in motor function, and it can be restored, but it needs rest for a while.”
Mr. Deneuve is a French actress who appeared in numerous film works such as "Chelbourg's Umbrella" and "The Last Train", and also starred in the latest work "Truth" directed by Hirokazu Koeda, released this year. He is currently shooting for other works.
